imdb.plot outline: In what remains of the world there is no war, no crime, no disease, no poverty, no religion. There is also no choice and there is no freedom. We are controlled by one, all powerful corporation and its giant artificial Intelligence brain that tracks, monitors and judges us 24-7. We are rewarded for our compliance with social scores and lifestyle upgrades. We have forgotten what it is to be human, to experience free will. The only remaining chance of salvation from this brainwashed slumber are a motley crew of highly skilled misfits and musicians, unsuspectingly bought together by a genius mind and the most audacious plan ever conceived. The world needs a new kind of hero and, in the next 15,768,017.03 seconds, it might just have them
imdb.title: Wars
